Name: ZooSim
About the game: !! FREE DEMO AVAILABLE NOW !! After the humans disappeared to the apocalypse, the animals are left to their own devices. One day, Lala the Sheep stumbles upon a Zoo. But the animals are stuck in their cages! Better help get them out, Lala! ZooSim is an adventure exploration game set after the fall of humanity. From eccentric hermits to hard working professionals, this zoo has creatures you would not believe! Befriend them all, and rescue the Zoo from the Apocalypses still lurking past the Silence of the Gods.... Features Meet over 50 zoo animals, and free them from their cages! Character-driven story! For instance, reunite a computer with their beloved mother in literature's most tearjerking scene! Jokes! Funnies! Little blessings from the heavens that make you laugh! Get your teeth cleaned by a friendly dentist! 60,000 yummy gummy words! Play mini-games along the way! Eight cool endings! Choose the mayor best suited to lead the zoo!
Developers: The Unconditional Love of 400,000 Little Birds
